NPR Podcasts [Feeds]

Aug 15, 2005

After wasting an afternoon figuring out how to set up Audio Hijack to automatically record yesterday’s All Things Considered, Fresh Air, and Marketplace so that I can listen to them on my iPod, I found out that NPR is going to start offering free podcasts! (Along with the shows they already offer fee podcasts of through the iTunes music store.) I hope its true…
